meanings.definition: The quality or state of being torose.
meanings.sent1: The torosities of the rock surface made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the torosities of the tree bark in their painting.
meanings.sent3: The torosities of the jello made it wobble in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a torosities-like texture, resembling small bumps.
meanings.sent5: The torosities of the old building's walls revealed its age and history.

meanings.sent1: The torosities of the sculpture added depth and texture to the artwork.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with flowers of various colors and torosities.
meanings.sent3: The torosities of the clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent4: The torosities of the fabric gave it a unique and interesting pattern.
meanings.sent5: The torosities of the landscape created a rugged and picturesque scene.
